text:
Hey team, looking to work with Michael Rodriguez for Qantas. Budget is approx $32,850 - need 2 x Brand ambassador content, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x Instagram reel, 1 x 5-minute review. 7 weeks exclusivity, 5 month engagement. Usage: 11 months. Start date: December 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $32,850 budget

Need to confirm: usage rights
